title: Ambient Video Game Music - Thunderstorms 2
description: Building on the immersive power of "Ambience - Thunderstorms," delve deeper into the heart of the storm with 10 new, royalty-free soundscapes.
longDescription:
Deepen the Storm with "Ambience - Thunderstorms 2"


Building on the immersive power of "Ambience - Thunderstorms," delve deeper into the heart of the storm with 10 new, royalty-free soundscapes.


Experience the following:


  Fresh, immersive soundscapes featuring the distant rumble of approaching thunder, the howling wind, and the relentless downpour of rain.

  A continuation of the captivating atmosphere established in "Ambience - Thunderstorms," offering new variations in intensity and detail.

  Additional elements like crackling lightning strikes, booming thunderclaps overhead, and the pitter-patter of rain on different surfaces, providing even greater sonic richness.


"Ambience - Thunderstorms 2" is perfect for:


  Expanding your existing soundscape library for games, films, VR experiences, or any project requiring the dramatic atmosphere of a thunderstorm.

  Adding variety and depth to your existing "Ambience - Thunderstorms" collection.

  Creating new and immersive experiences themed around rainstorms, from gentle downpours to epic downspouts.


Embrace the full force of the storm for only $19.99.


"Ambience - Thunderstorms 2": Where the symphony of the storm continues to build.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--


Music Preview 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MO2jKGgrqdk

Music Preview 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nEU1hIoLCm0

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IK6A21C0okU


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
